title: Online Certified Training for Peer Experts: Enhancing Practical Competencies in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing smartphone-based accessibility and self-directed learning for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply five core tools for solving math-based practical problems within four weeks
Learners demonstrate conceptual understanding by achieving over 80% on formative assessments at course completion
Learners implement at least two mathematical approaches in real work environments based on instructional content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
